title: Any Other Uses For Blue Essence?
body: So I've been playing since season 2. About a month or so ago, I finished collecting every single champion in the game. I now have a boat-load of blue essence saved up with nothing to spend it on. Is there anything I can do with it, other than buying champions? I mean, can I at least convert it into something else? If anyone knows anything, please halp.

replies.body:
Hey W15P, besides buying or crafting champions, you can use Blue Essence on:

* Champion Mastery Levels - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752824#h1
* Content in Essence Emporium (the last time it was opened was late 2018) - https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/preseason-essence-emporium-now-live

A question regarding the upcoming essence emporium: Will regular emotes be made available to purchase for BE?

Also, will it be possible to gift champions with BE for the duration of the emporium?
Can you make any comment on the state of the matchmaker?

Hate to be a nagging nelly, but wasn't one of the original goals of the new currency system to grant individuals with excessive blue essence/IP stores something to use it for?
While champion mastery is something, once you have mastery on the champs you want there's nothing left to spend it on. Even if one was to master every champion, it would hardly make a dent in a veterans blue essence stockpile.

The blue essence emporium in the grand scheme of things is pretty meh. Generally one picks one icon and sticks with it, with a rare breed seeking to catch em all. Rendering almost all of what is on offer, a real downer. The essence discounts are irrelevant to people with this much essence, rendering name change, rune pages, XP boosts.
The one saving grace is the urfwick skin. However it is definitely expensive essence wise (despite buying almost nothing with blue essence in years, I'm sitting at around 50K) and isn't that exciting in the grand scheme of things.

This leaves allot of people with zero progression outside of LP if they play ranked at all unfortunately
Kind brings to question  why do we even need it or want it? . honestly, I think more people play for ranking than in game currency that imo feels useless outside of name changes.
